help.helpstring: Help function to show what commands are available

args.command_name (optional): Command name to look up for in particular

bingo.helpstring: (Pseudo-)Randomly sends Lenna's or Leva's bingo video! very cute!!!

echo.helpstring: Lenna will repeat what Shikikan says!

args.*args: Words to be repeated by Lenna

doll.helpstring: Looks up doll information given a doll name and posts it as an embed

args.doll_name: Name of the doll to search

keys.helpstring: Looks up a doll's neural key information given a doll name and posts it as an embed

args.doll_name: Name of the doll to search

weapon.helpstring: Looks up weapon information given a weapon name and posts it as an embed

args.weapon_name: Name of the weapon to search

define.helpstring: Looks up status effect information given a status effect name and posts it as an embed

args.status_effect_name: Name of the status effect to search
